content.query:
USE [serverless]
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [sys].[schemas] WHERE [name] = N'Configurations') EXEC ('CREATE SCHEMA [Configurations]')
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [sys].[schemas] WHERE [name] = N'Metadata') EXEC ('CREATE SCHEMA [Metadata]')
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('[Configurations].[Tables]') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [Configurations].[Tables];  

GO
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [Configurations].[Tables](
  [Dataset] [nvarchar](128),
  [Schema] [nvarchar](128),
  [Table] [nvarchar](128),
) WITH     ( LOCATION='Clients/Tables.csv', DATA_SOURCE = [Configurations]    , FILE_FORMAT = [delimitedtext_pipe_firstrow2]    )

GO
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [Configurations].[PowerBIWorkspaces](
  [BodyExpression] [nvarchar](max),
  [Batch] [nvarchar](128)
) WITH     ( LOCATION='Clients/PowerBIWorkspaces.csv', DATA_SOURCE = [Configurations]    , FILE_FORMAT = [delimitedtext_pipe_firstrow2]    )

GO
CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE [dbo].[ExecuteQueryCET]
  @queryCET nvarchar(max)
AS
BEGIN

  EXEC (@queryCET)

END
